# isNonNullable() function
<!-- Do not edit this file. It is automatically generated by API Documenter. -->

[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@esdmr/assert](./esdmr.assert.md) &gt; [isNonNullable](./esdmr.assert.isnonnullable.md)


Asserts that the given value is not `null` or `undefined`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isNonNullable<T>(value: T | null | undefined): asserts value is T;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | T \| null \| undefined | Value to assert. |

<b>Returns:</b>

asserts value is T
